review: Had this for about one month. Does not have as many channels as Roku but the apps work fine - especially ESPN. Little to no buffering and streams great.  For the intro price of $19.00, it is a great product.

review: Amazon has a long way to go on these.  They continue to reboot as you are trying to start an App.  You have to login to Netflix about every 3 times you turn on the tv. I will be switching back to Roku until they have some software upgrades.
author: Amazon Customer

review: So far it works great. Wish it had HBO Go app..
author: Amanda Simpson

review: It's nice if you want your videos from Amazon prime on a large screen.  I have a Kindle, that I absolutely love and I thought I could play all the games that I have on it with this.  Nope!  There are not near the amount of games available on this,  but I betcha it won't be long that more and more will be added.  It's nice to watch the prime movies on it,  also Netflix if you are subscribed to it.  I will certainly enjoy this for years to come.
author: fonts "gayle"

review: Very nice - it's a great replacement for cable, 'cause there's never anything on cable worth watching except "Law and Order."
author: Charles J. Allen IV

review: Great way to view Amazon prime video.  Wifi would not link up directly with my comcast cable modem.  I had to route it through my d-link wifi router for the fire stick to recognize the wifi and the Internet.

review: This is a great product and a welcome alternative to my Apple TV.  Thank you, Amazon, for offering it at a discount for Prime members.  I LOVE this product!  I love PRIME!
